entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
